Identification_Area.title: CONTOUR FORWARD IMAGER GROUND OCF DATA

Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

External_Reference.reference_text: Conard, S., J.W. Warren, O.S. Barnuoin-Jha , J.F. Bell, J.D. Boldt, A.F. Bowman, A.L. Cochran, E.H. Darlington, T. Deluzio, D. Fiore, D. Garcia, B.L. Gotwols, M.P. Grey, A. Harch, J.R. Hayes, K.J. Heffernan, D.C. Humm, N.R. Izenberg, K.E. Kosakowski, H.M. Luther, D.S. Mehoke, S.L. Murchie, L.M. Prockter, B. Rider, D. Sampath, E.D. Schaefer, S. Svenson, H.W. Taylor, P.L. Thompson, J. Veverka, R.L. Williams, and P. Wilson, CONTOUR Forward Imager on the Comet Nucleus Tour Mission, SPIE Proceedings, San Diego, CA, USA, August, 2003.

Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_name: CONTOUR FORWARD IMAGER GROUND OCF DATA
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: This dataset contains raw counts from the CONTOUR Forward Imager (CFI) instrument during ground calibration in the Optical Calibration Facility (OCF) at JHU/APL in 2002.
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: This dataset contains raw counts from the CONTOUR Forward Imager (CFI) instrument during ground calibration in the Optical Calibration Facility (OCF) at JHU/APL in 2002.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview =================
This dataset contains raw counts from the CONTOUR Forward Imager (CFI) instrument during ground calibration in the Optical Calibration Facility (OCF) at JHU/APL in 2002.
************************************************************************ *CAVEAT* *CAVEAT* *CAVEAT* *CAVEAT* *CAVEAT* *CAVEAT* *CAVEAT* *CAVEAT*
Because contact was lost with the CONTOUR spacecraft one month after launch, there is no mission data to be archived for this mission, but ground calibration data and this documentation CD have been archived to document the work completed at that point and to support future comet flyby missions.
************************************************************************
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note:
Confidence Level Overview =========================
The data archived was taken from individual instruments in the Optical Calibration Facility, and may differ from data taken with the instruments installed on the spacecraft.
************************************************************************ *CAVEAT* *CAVEAT* *CAVEAT* *CAVEAT* *CAVEAT* *CAVEAT* *CAVEAT* *CAVEAT*
Because contact was lost with the CONTOUR spacecraft one month after launch, there is no mission data to be archived for this mission, but ground calibration data and this documentation CD have been archived to document the work completed at that point and to support future comet flyby missions.
No work has been done to assess the confidence level of the archived data. ************************************************************************
************************************************** *CAVEAT*CAVEAT*CAVEAT*CAVEAT*CAVEAT*CAVEAT*CAVEAT*
The flight calibration images needed to complete the calibration software were never taken. The archived calibration software is therefore incomplete. **************************************************
